column2: Currently experiencing a service outage. 25000 effected CSR tells me & it won't be back till 7am. Phone, internet & TV all down. A notification would've been nice...o wait... #shaw #shawhelp #surreybc
@Shawhelp we've bought the UFC package like 12 times and nothing. Why? #shawhelp
#ShawHelp Shaw just gave away my home phone #, phone went down, chatted w/ support, and agent confirmed someone else answered my #... Brutal pic.twitter.com/smVnbKtrMf
#shawhelp I have an error EA5 on my pVR that comes and goes. When it comes, the channel disappear
Pt 3. Can someone reschedule the #nhlplayoffs while I wait for my #blueskytv to get fixed? That'd be great #shawhelp
Pt 2. #blueskytv will be down again all week while we wait for a tech. #shawhelp has been good so far.
Watching #SXonFOX on #Shawhelp ! What about the rest of the year? Canada only gets one, silly cable company! pic.twitter.com/Vkbeaa5QVg
If #shawhelp was a man, he would be popping #viagra now b/c lady is not happy #internetdown #notworking #outage
Watching the Anaheim/Edmonton game with #FreerangeTV saving $12/day while in the hospital. Awesome #shawhelp pic.twitter.com/kBMEEnPcee
But did you turn it off and on again. #ShawHelp lol
@ShawInfo makes it so not enjoyable to watch a program #shawhelp #shawTV pic.twitter.com/I75hMI5y9X
#shawhelp if I am subscribed to HBO why can't I watch it on shaw on demand?
I just got the two channels I wanted for $6 rather than upgrading to the whole package, which I don't watch most of. woohoo. #Shawhelp
